hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Kokiri Emerald#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Market Potion Shop#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #Skulls#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #Skulls#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.
